name: Amdon Learning
description: The Amdon Group is a global EdTech provider of interactive content in STEM Education. It brings together a unique combination of inquiry-based pedagogy, curriculum design, and expertise in interactive content development to enable its partners to transform their learning vision into reality. Over the years, Amdon has won awards including “Best Educational Software Award” in 2011, and “Singapore Promising Brand Award” in 2012. In 2016, Amdon was listed as one of the “10 Most Promising Education Technology Solution Provider” by APAC CIO Outlook.

enhanced_description: Amdon Learning, offered by the global EdTech provider Amdon Group, specializes in delivering interactive content for STEM education, primarily targeted at preschool and elementary school children. Leveraging over 20 years of experience in cognitive, behavioral, and social learning, the platform facilitates online and offline access to personalized learning experiences. Amdon's approach combines inquiry-based pedagogy and curriculum design with rapid, world-class content production, aiming to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency.
